disable: DC 25  Survival  (trained) to distract or trick the plants or DC 22  Nature  (expert) to calm the plants
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Hazard 5" pfs="">[Agitated Carnivorous Plants](/Hazards.aspx?ID=92)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 36</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Many carnivorous plants that were once kept satiated now hunger for any meat they can get, even lashing out onto the path to get it.

---

**Stealth**
DC 20 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 25 [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (trained) to distract or trick the plants or DC 22 [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22) (expert) to calm the plants

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 20, **Fort** +17, **Ref** +9

**HP**
60 (BT 30)

**Immunities**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)

**Weaknesses**
[acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) 10, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10, slashing 10

</column>

**Trapping Vines** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature moves within reach of the carnivorous plants' vines; **Effect** The vines wrap around the triggering creature. The creature must succeed at a DC 22 Reflex save or be [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 22). Whether or not the creature is grabbed, the plants make a gnawing plants Strike against the creature.

 **Melee** <actions string="Single Action" /> gnawing plants +17, **Damage** 8d4+12 piecing
name: Agitated Carnivorous Plants
